Mounting<br style="font-size: 19px;"><br style="font-size: 19px;">The initial render - component creation<br style="font-size: 19px;"></font></p>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#000000;strokeWidth=1;verticalAlign=middle;fontSize=19;spacing=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="59" y="98" width="180" height="167" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nkhXYSmxJGoHC3NO6jfj-6" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;" edge="1" parent="1" source="nkhXYSmxJGoHC3NO6jfj-3" target="nkhXYSmxJGoHC3NO6jfj-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nkhXYSmxJGoHC3NO6jfj-3" value="<font color="#000000" style="font-size: 19px;">2. Updating<br style="font-size: 19px;"><br style="font-size: 19px;">Triggered by a change of <i style="font-size: 19px;">state </i>or <i style="font-size: 19px;">props.</i><br style="font-size: 19px;"></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#000000;strokeWidth=1;verticalAlign=middle;fontSize=19;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="324" y="98" width="180" height="168" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nkhXYSmxJGoHC3NO6jfj-4" value="<font color="#000000" style="font-size: 19px;">3. Unmounting<br style="font-size: 19px;"><br style="font-size: 19px;">Component is removed from the DOM<br style="font-size: 19px;"></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#000000;strokeWidth=1;verticalAlign=middle;fontSize=19;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="589" y="100" width="180" height="164" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nkhXYSmxJGoHC3NO6jfj-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#000000;" edge="1" parent="1" source="nkhXYSmxJGoHC3NO6jfj-2" target="nkhXYSmxJGoHC3NO6jfj-3"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="421" y="253" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="471" y="203" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

p.font:
1. Mounting
The initial render - component creation

Triggered by a change of state or props.
